dialogues.text: Julie?... Hey, you are a looker. A BURST OF LAUGHTER from the others in the room. Weeping JULIE flings herself across the bed and hugs him tight. While JULIE is hugging him, STU is checking out his new f toes, RUBBING his sparse patch of CHEST FUR. DOCTORS and in amazement from the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a miracle. It's a miracle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two more ticks of the clock... STU is almost oblivious to JULIE. He lifts up the sheet, peek at his CROTCH, and grins delightedly. JULIE gives him another kiss, WHISPERS in his ear:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. Thank you for coming back to me. What she doesn't know is that, although he still looks li body is now occupied by MONKEYBONE. Since he's now a hybr man on the outside and monkey within, let's call him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boy, I don't know about you guys, but I'm starving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A damp, stonewalled VAULT with a barred door. STU is spra floor, OUT COLD, when a VOICE awakes him... RAT GUARD (o.s.)

A torrent of JUNK - stale popcorn, half-eat molten ice cream pops, and sticky soda - rains down ON HI A horde of DARK FIGURES emerge from the shadowy catacombs All at once, HANDS are grabbing at him from all direction a SCREAM - backs up against a wall -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are y-- WHAT DO YOU WANT?? A MONGOL WARRIOR with a droopy mustache looks up at him.

A long-haired SL dives on a Hershey bar with only one bite out of it, but familiar FAT MAN gets there first. STU gapes at him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alfred Hitchcock??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A fat bastard, but damn quick on his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's how he keeps his girlish figure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotta move fast in this crowd, or you'll starve. Here you go, pal. Have some popcorn. He offers STU a box of popcorn soaked in Dr. Pepper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this stuff?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They feed us the slops from the Morpheum Theatre. You hope for Jujubes, settle for goobers. - I'm Steve. Steve King.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stephen King? What are you doing in here? Various OTHERS emerge from the shadows to shake STU's han

dialogues.text: I'm Jack the Ripper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Typhoid Mary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Atilla the Hun. Trade you a Twizzler for a box of Raisinets!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Atilla the - ! What in hell is this place? As if in reply, a FANFARE sounds in the distance...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All hail the most glorious! Most eminent! Most esteemed all-powerful God of Sleep...his Royal Lassitude -

dialogues.text: Enough, enough, I'm hung over. As HYPNOS passes, the DUNGEON DWELLERS race up to the WAL separates the entry area from the dungeon proper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hyp! Did you bring me the cough medicine?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you remember the night light I asked for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: King, you pussy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bite me, Poe! I hate waking up in the dark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, Steve, maybe next time. And how's our new guest settling in - ?

dialogues.speaker: YOU SET ME UP
dialogues.text: STU LUNGES at HYPNOS - who backs up just out of reach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easy, pal! I was coming to congratulate you. It ain't easy snatching one of those E-tickets. Steve here was the last guy to pull it off, and that musta been, what, 25 years ago...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why'd you do it? What'd I ever do to you?!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's simple, Stu. We need nightmares - lots of 'em. So whenever we can swing it, we send a guy up to stimulate the flow...a nightmare maker! Like Steve here. Poe. Rasputin...we've been doing this all the way back to Atilla and Genghis Khan!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But why me? Why'd you pick on me??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The monkey, of course. It was his idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Monkeybone...!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody wants to be a sidekick, Stu. So one day he comes to us - he's got a proposition. We help him get your body...in return he gives us all the nightmares we want.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're nuts! I'm a comic strip artist! What's he gonna do - draw really scary cartoons??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no, no, no. Y'see, Stu, as it happens, that girlfriend of yours figured out the chemical basis of bad dreams. And she just whipped up a big old batch of nightmare juice! STU's face goes white as he realizes the point of the mas

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, we're predicting a record box-office. It's like I always say...nightmares are your best entertainment! HYPNOS marches off, chuckling. STU's head sinks into his

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STU's back from the hospital. JULIE is removing his bags of KIMMY's car while STU and KIMMY chat in the front seat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just couldn't stand the thought of you suffering. I love you so, I would never have... forgive me, Stu. Please forgive me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kimmy. Chill. We've still got a pact. If anything ever happens to you, I'll be right there to return the favor. (baring his teeth) So drive carefully! From now on. He climbs out. KIMMY is so rattled that she smacks bumper parked in front of her. She PEELS OUT with the hand brake INT. STU & JULIE'S HOUSE - DAY STU-BONE and JULIE enter with luggage. He stands there fo scoping out the unfamiliar surroundings. She sets the bag him on the shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome home. STU-BONE grins insipidly. She kisses him, pulls him into - and then, overwhelmed by emotion, begins to SOB.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, baby, I can't believe you're back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Home sweet home, huh? Actually, I was expecting something a little swankier. How much loot does old Stu rake in, anyway? She gives him an extremely puzzled look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meaning me, of course. I'm referring to myself. You have to assume Monkeybone would be a pretty lucrative franchise...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby? Why don't you just...rest on the sofa for a minute. I'll be right back. She goes into the kitchen as STU-BONE plops onto the sofa bowl of FRESH FRUIT on the coffee table and immediately t a banana with his FOOT. But he can't. He's got shoes on. Frowning, he unties his his sock. His bare foot is in the fruit bowl when JULIE r kitchen with a TRAY holding a chocolate cake and the bott Stu bought three months ago. The cake bears the message " I LOVE YOU" in pink icing. She sits beside him with the goodies. He removes his foot crosses his legs, WIGGLES HIS TOES at her. She smiles unc she opens the bottle of champagne and pours two flutes fu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here's to a bottle...we should have opened... three months ago. She finishes pouring, hands a flute to STU-BONE. His face with CAKE and ICING. He's scooped out a big fistful and c into his pie hole. He GRINS at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bitchin' good cake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stu, are you...feeling okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure. Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're acting kind of...odd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (grabbing another fistful) In what way? Then: we hear TINY NAILS skittering across the hardwood f speed. And BUSTER THE DOG races into the living room!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Buster! Look who's here! STU-BONE tenses instinctively. The dog is yipping, waggin insanely at the sight of his long-lost master - until he little bit closer, and senses that something is very, ver BUSTER sizes STU-BONE up and GROWLS. STU-BONE bares his t HISSES. The dog LUNGES - and STU-BONE jumps up on the sof

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh shit, the cake! He bends down, snatches up the cake, and CRADLES IT under KICKS AT BUSTER from the sofa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mine. Get back! MINE!! The frazzled JULIE pours herself another jolt of champagn one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SOUNDS of JULIE taking a shower in the adjacent bathroom STU-BONE is sprawled in bed, pillows propped up behind hi channels on the bedroom TV with his trusty remote. The Di happens to be showing a Jane Goodall special... NARRATOR (on TV)

dialogues.text: The mating rituals of the African silverback are as rigidly formalized as those of any animal we know - with the possible exception of man. Onscreen a FEMALE GORILLA is presenting her furry haunche MALE. STU-BONE watches this erotic spectacle with a connoisseur glances over at the open bathroom door and catches a teas JULIE'S SHADOW as she steps out of the shower and pulls o SCRATCHES and SNIFFS, just to put himself in the mood. On TV: MONKEY FOREPLAY, which consists of a pounce from b NARRATOR (on TV)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the wild, a dominant chimpanzee male is likely to engage in sex numerous times throughout the day, with a shockingly wide variety of - STU-BONE mutes the nature special and sneaks up behind JU emerges from the bathroom in her robe and towel-turban.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you watching?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ohhh, nothing. She tries to pass, but he grabs the belt of her robe and around. He delicately unwraps the turban, then opens her it closed around the two of them. They kiss...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sure this is...medically advisable?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got a doctor on duty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well. As long as it's okay with Monkeybone - STU-BONE almost lets out a gasp of shock. What does she m

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (glancing downward) - which it seems to be. STU-BONE does a take. The good news is, she doesn't suspe news is, he's apparently named after his creator's penis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All at once the air is full of Barry White's lush bariton bedroom CD player. Through the bedroom doorway we see STU waltzing romantically, belly to belly, still wrapped up i robe. The only jarring note is BUSTER'S FRANTIC BARKING. The po behind an accordion gate in the hall, going crazy, trying mistress about the imposter in STU's body. The dog is alm out Barry White - - so STU-BONE stops kissing JULIE long enough to reach ov foot and KICK THE DOOR SHUT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JULIE watches from the bed as STU-BONE begins peeling off going into a bizarrely formalized MONKEY MATING DANCE. He and forth from one side of the bed to the other, making f FEINTING at her occasionally. JULIE has some dim sense that this ritual is supposed to in fact, it's making her damned nervous. She finds hersel on the bed, trying to keep out of STU-BONE's way. Now he LEAPS UP onto the foot of the bed. REARS BACK. And howl of triumph, POUNCES AT JULIE! Terrified, she rolls out of the way. STU-BONE'S SKULL sla headboard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, God!! Baby! Are you - Dazed, he sits up. He tries to stand, but his rubbery leg he pitches over - CRACKING HIS SKULL AGAIN on the nightst

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How was it? I don't recall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was great, baby. Let's get you to the ER. As they pass, BUSTER lets out a little growl of satisfact his gate. HOLD ON THE DOG's satisfied expression as STU-B balance and topples down the stairs O.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RASPUTIN, ATILLA, JACK THE RIPPER and STEPHEN KING are en their weekly Parcheesi game. STU is clinging to the bars, fate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not like the rest of you. I'm just a regular guy! I'm not a "nightmare maker."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neither are we. We got our bodies hijacked just like you. The guys who replaced us are the nightmare makers!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like me. I was a mess sergeant in the Mongol Horde. I never wanted to be the Scourge of Asia. I just wanted a new recipe for yak!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was Jack the Haberdasher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But how? Did you all have sidekicks? Figments? ...Monkeys??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, I got screwed over by my own dog. Go through hell to get that E-ticket, and who winds up in my body? That darn Cujo. TYPHOID MARY runs past, GIGGLING, pursued by a huffing HI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's sure got a thing for those icy blondes. KAZOOS SOUND. The RAT GUARD appears to announce:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miley. You got a visitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Kitty?!? At the sight of STU behind bars, she breaks down CRYING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm so sorry, Stu. I wanted to tell you what was going on. I really, really liked you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kitty...my situation is really not important. The thing is, my girlfriend is now living with, and possibly engaged to, a demented monkey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're such a beautiful man. Look at you - stuck in this place, and only thinking of her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen to me! Is there any way I can warn her what Monkeybone is up to??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time's up! Break it up, you two. The RAT GUARD pushes STU back with a prod. KITTY reaches

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Give me a moment. Just to look at him. Oh, Stu. Oh, my sweet, sweet Stu. As she gazes at him, love struck, the overhead PANEL open of CRUD from the Morpheum lands directly on STU.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Feeding time! KITTY BAWLS inconsolably as the RAT GUARD leads her away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STU-BONE in pajamas and a head bandage, reading the morni pounds the table, practically WEEPING with hilarity at th COMIC STRIP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Priceless! Priceless! This stuff just kills me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm heading in to work, baby. Are you sure you'll be okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah. There's just one thing I don't get. "Monkeybone Creator Awakens from Coma" that's a big story! That's front page news! But I can't find a word of coverage in this stinkin' rag! (shuffling through the paper) Hey. Don't I have a TV show?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They only made the one episode. They've shown it about nineteen times.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need a new PR guy. JULIE grins, plants a goodbye smooch on his forehead, and waits a minute, then reaches for the PHONE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The house is crawling with PRESS. There must be three doz and PHOTOGRAPHERS and TV CREWS hanging on STUBONE's eve

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, being in a coma taught Stu Miley a thing or two about life. Buckle your seat belts, for one. But seriously, Stu Miley is a different man today. I'm much homier. The front door opens. A stunned JULIE pushes her way insi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And speaking of which, here's the light of my life, the pert and saucy Miss Julie McElroy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had to park two blocks away. Is something - He pulls her to his side for a photo op. FLASHBULBS go of

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I took the liberty of calling a little press conference. We're on TV, so don't say "shit." (covering his mouth) Shit! I said it. Shit! I said it again!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stu, what is it about Monkeybone that makes him so popular?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, it's partly that he punctures all the phony pretensions of our modern society...and it's partly that he's a breathtakin', heartbreakin', rump-shakin' sex machine! (beat) Ask these gentlemen here. They're an important cog in my media machine. They'll be doing six new episodes of the Monkeybone show under my personal supervision. He pauses for a photo op with MIKE CACHUELA and MIKE MITC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's all synergy. The show synergizes the strip, which synergizes the merchandising, which synergizes the religion, which synergizes the Barbara Walters special; and then, baby, we are all in the United Empire of Monkeybonia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JULIE squeezes through the crowd, finds HERB working the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I tell you, he's ready to merchandise. We've gotta move quickly. Get the toy guys, the burger guys, the lunchbox guys -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Herb...what in God's name - HERB holds up a finger. He's too busy talking. STU-BONE e video crew in tow. JULIE somehow manages to sideline him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's this about merchandising? You always hated merchandising!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, baby, I do, but to look at it from another angle...there's a potload of money here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SUPERCHARGED POP MUSIC underneath as STU-BONE comes runni corner - followed, a moment later, by a SCREAMING HORDE o GROUPIES in black miniskirts and high heels. It's like so A Hard Day's Night, only more so.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TIGHT on STU-BONE, head still bandaged, eyes closed, SNOR He wears a big monkey grin as he DREAMS the above.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CARLOAD OF SUPERMODELS. They kill their engine in the m intersection and climb out to join the mob chasing STU-BO He cuts around a corner, ducks into an alley, and FLATTEN behind a dumpster. As the girls run past, he pulls out a and MOPS SWEAT from his brow. Then, with a what-the-hell twinkle, he steps out and FLIN HANKIE into the midst of the GROUPIES. A CATFIGHT ensues scramble after this precious memento. The chase resumes. Suddenly he realizes he's SLOWING DOWN...running in SLO-M with the girls on his trail. After a moment, he FREEZES. anything except his EYES; he looks right, left, up, down. ...and suddenly he sees HYPNOS winking into view directly him! HYPNOS is perfectly capable of moving. He strolls ri frozen STU-BONE and SLAPS HIM REPEATEDLY, Moe Howard-styl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You two-bit simian stooge. WHAT THE HELL IS THIS? We didn't send you up here to shake your booty and chase broads. We sent you up to make nightmares!! STU-BONE tries to speak. All that comes out is a slo-mo D

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now find that nightmare juice and get to work. 'Cause you may be a free man during the day... but when you dream, your monkey ass is mine! He winds up - throws a ROUNDHOUSE PUNCH at STU-BONE'S FAC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STU-BONE sits up suddenly in bed. For a moment he's relie all a dream. Then he realizes his FACE is swelling like a prizefighter's. His front tooth is loose. BLOOD is stream nose!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eep!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's awake, fully dressed, and fishing around in the pock topcoat. He finds her KEY RING and tiptoes furtively to t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Friggin' Hypnos. I'll show him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He unlocks the door and enters the darkened lab. Finds th area and kneels beside a LOCKED REFRIGERATOR. Then he shu the keys on the ring until he finds one labelled "FRIDGE. On the top shelf is a corked beaker of purple fluid beari "ONEIRIX" with red DANGER stickers all over it. STU-BONE flashes a sinister grin, and EMPTIES ITS CONTENTS into a Then he refills the original from a hip flask and replace He's just about to leave when he's startled by a series o and SQUEAKS - which are TRANSLATED in SUBTITLE:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, handsome. He turns and spots a SEDUCTIVE FEMALE BABOON who's confme the corner. The conversation continues in MONKEY TALK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, you. Come here, good-looking. (beat) Why don't you let me out of this cage?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, I'd love to, baby, but...it'd put me in hot water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (caressing his chin) I know how to be very, very grateful. He pulls out a MATCHBOOK and scribbles a number on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell you what, angel. When you get out, give me a call... A LIGHT goes on suddenly in the outside hallway! STU-BONE for cover, but the FEMALE BABOON grabs him by the belt an against the cage. Startled, he drops the ONEIRIX BEAKER - which rolls out i

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The beaker CLATTERS LOUDLY as it rolls through the lab do HANDS grope through the doorway - but the FEMALE BABOON h the pants leg and won't let go, no matter how much he rat He can't quite pull himself through the door... He unbuckles the belt. UNZIPS HIS PANTS. Keeps clawing to beaker. But he still can't quite make it, and the BABOON Now his pants are down around his knees. He keeps wriggli pants legs are entirely INSIDE OUT - and still he can't q beaker! His shoes are caught in his pants cuffs! RRRRRIPP Freedom! Minus his pants, he GRABS THE BEAKER. In FG through all this is a dim teenage JANITOR pushing h floor polisher. He has his Walkman on and he can't hear a mayhem behind him. He sings along atonally with the music

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gettin' jiggy wit' it - gettin' jiggy wit' it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A disheveled STU-BONE, back from his secret mission, is t his clothes off so he won't wake JULIE. But she starts to jumps into bed fully dressed and pulls up the covers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stu? Is that you? Where did you go?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me? Nowhere. I was asleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby, don't lie. I know you went out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not me. Nope. You must've been dreaming. She pulls the covers back. He's still wearing his topcoat and shorts...but NO PANTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're wearing a topcoat, Stu. - Where are your pants?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, Miss Smarty, if I didn't go out, I wouldn't need any pants. Now would I? He pulls the covers up to his chin. The two of them lie t dark staring up at the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The entire Monkeybone brain trust has come to visit: HERB head MR. BOWERS, and several CORPORATE REPS hoping to arr deals. Host STU-BONE has started to take on a simian look prominent ears, flared nostrils, heavy beard stubble, etc The BURGER GOD REP sets a tray of FAST FOOD in front of S packaging all covered with angelic haloed Monkeybones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As you know, Burger God has 1700 outlets nationwide...we're prepared to back a major TV buy to launch our Mega Monkey Meal. (beat) Go ahead. Try a bite. STU-BONE takes a bite out of his Monkeyburger - looks ple then begins PICKING something out of his teeth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the matter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think it's a pig hair. (examining a contract) How much is McDonald's offering?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Less. STU-BONE immediately signs the contract and shakes hands GOD REP. HERB consults his agenda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, here's something. The city zoo is kicking off a fund-raising campaign. They wonder if you'd be willing to appear at a benefit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, nothing. It's a benefit. But we could probably get People and Entertainment Tonight to cover it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I get it. We could give the public the impression that we were doing something... charitable. Brilliant!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And last...you remember Bill here, from the Bazoom Toy Company? He's got a little something I think you'll like. The TOY REP sets a LOCKBOX on the table. A stencil on the SECRET." He pulls out a key and opens it to reveal... ...a tuxedoed, collector's-edition MONKEYBONE DOLL lying CRUSHED PURPLE VELVET. He carefully removes the treasure Its right hand is hinged. The doll's thumb is UP ITS REAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a prototype. Code name "Little Jack Horner." Go on - pull out his thumb. STU-BONE stares at the doll - cautiously yanks its thumb SLO-MO as the rising arm causes a NOXIOUS AEROSOL SPRAY t Monkeybone's ass! And we STAY in slo-mo as STU-BONE stares at the doll in w awe...a man in looooove. Still in slo-mo, the EXECS crack up, gag, hold their nose stank of it. STU-BONE is the only one not laughing. He re touch the doll - to fondle it adoringly - - and suddenly we're back to REAL-TIME.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know kids - they love anything gross...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kids? Kids?! This is a work of genius. This is art. This is the answer to all my prayers! (beat) Say - just a technical question - could you fill these babies up with a particulate solution of one part chemical enzyme to ten parts water?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well - I guess...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aww righhhhht! He breaks into RIOTOUS LAUGHTER and begins blasting monke and the EXECS, who dive for cover under the conference ta

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laughter and back-slapping as STU-BONE walks his guests t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So here's my idea. We do a giveaway at the zoo benefit. We get a big piata. We fill it with Monkeybone dolls - hundreds of 'em.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A piata. That's a great idea!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys don't know it, but you just saved my ass! With a big grin, he pantomimes sticking a thumb up his as imitation of the doll, and then gives the thumbs-up sign. EXECS gape at him as he goes back inside - he's developed gait, and his arms swing outward in wide arcs as he walks

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Interesting fellow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Head trauma.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He digs around under the sink, finds the purple beaker of at the FARTING DOLL...and GRINS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This'll get him off my back!

dialogues.speaker: TV SCREEN
dialogues.text: A PROMO for the MONKEYBONE cartoon show. MONKEYBONE swing screen on a vine, followed by a string of grinning, live- doing a scratch 'n' sniff, pull-out-a-plum LINE DANCE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's his world - we just live in it. Monkeybone! Back with six all-new episodes, starting -

dialogues.speaker: NIGHT
dialogues.text: A distraught JULIE mutes the TV. Her friend ALICE is on t her, having coffee and dessert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The thing is, I'm responsible for the way he's acting. It's the nightmare juice. It's got to be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie, that stuff probably saved his life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't explain this, Alice, but I'm not so sure it did. It's as if...he's not Stu any more. The Stu I love is gone! (beat) He spends all his time in the garage. He says he's...autographing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TIGHT ON the flask of ONEIRIX as STU-BONE picks it up. He's wearing a GAS MASK. He's rigged a CLOTHESLINE in the MONKEYBONE DOLLS are clipped to it, ass-end up - forming ASSEMBLY LINE. He dips a TURKEY BASTER into the flask...w quantity of purple fluid...plucks the FINGER out of the f behind... - and plunges the TURKEY BASTER into the doll's hindquart with ONEIRIX!! The doll's buttocks take on the purple hue of Orangutans in heat. STU-BONE holds the doll at arm's l its finger - launching a purple puff of SPIKED NIGHTMARE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, baby! Nightmare-in-a-butt! (looking around) Okay...guinea pig, guinea pig...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STU-BONE steps out into the driveway and hears a low grow giving him the stinkeye from behind the picket fence. STU light up with inspiration.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mere, boy...c'mere, ole buddy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOUD BARKING outside. JULIE wanders over toward the windo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen. Let's bring him in for some tests. I guarantee you're overreacting. JULIE lifts the curtain - and sees STU-BONE in his gas ma in a weird crab like stance, chasing BUSTER around the ya Monkeybone doll. JULIE doesn't seem especially surprised - but ALICE's mou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually, no, I don't think I'm overreacting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BUSTER is apparently ALONE now - he's pacing in circles u TREE BRANCH, staring up and GROWLING. Someone throws a PI picket fence. BUSTER'S HEAD TURNS, just for an instant -

dialogues.speaker: KREEEGAHHHH
dialogues.text: - and STU-BONE plunges out of the tree, DIRECTLY ON TOP O two of them GRAPPLE, rolling around on the grass. For a moment it looks like this battle royale could go ei STU-BONE gets on top of BUSTER, STRADDLES HIM, shoves the Monkeybone doll up against his muzzle... FOONT! A purple cloud of NIGHTMARE GAS hits BUSTER in the goes limp. His eyes roll back in his head. He starts to T

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweet dreams, you little bastard! Disheveled but triumphant, STU-BONE stands up, pounds his both fists, and lets out a Tarzanian ROAR. Lights go on a neighborhood. ANGRY NEIGHBORS poke their heads out the wi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STU-BONE skulks back into the garage. He throws back a ta HUNDREDS of boxed Monkeybone dolls, stacked so high they wall of the garage. He pulls out his turkey baster, crank clothesline, and goes to work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAMERA TRACKS IN on the twitching face of BUSTER, and we BUSTER'S DREAM (BLACK & WHITE) A German-expressionist nightmare, all low angles and heav We're in some kind of OPERATING ROOM, where a struggling being wheeled in on a tall, creaking GURNEY. Four ORDERLI masks are holding him down. The PATIENT is BUSTER. And the ORDERLIES...are CATS. A CAT SURGEON draws the sheet back. Looks at the spreadea And brandishes a big nasty pair of GARDEN SHEARS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Dark Town audience is scratching its collective head dream, which is showing in one of HYP'S NIGHTMARE ORBS. A slams down the phone and storms across the dance floor to circular bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dog dreams!! That stinkin' monkey. I can't believe it. We give him a body, and he sends us ...dogs. A FELINE BEAUTY embraces him from behind, pulls him onto

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's not think about dogs. Let's think about pussycats. Meeowwwwwwrrrr.... She draws ONE SHARP CLAW lightly down his chest. He gives you're-talkin' grin and hits a switch - causing the big c ROTATE off the dance floor and into the boudoir. As it turns, we see KITTY'S PAW closing discreetly around the nightstand...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STU's curled up on the dank floor when he's awakened by t VISITOR in the corridor outside - KITTY. She passes a sac FOOD and BOTTLED WATER through the bars - and SHUSHES the before he can speak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shh! You'll need it when you're traveling. Glancing back at the GUARDS, she pulls a KEY from her cle

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't ask where I got it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't do this! You'll get in trouble!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the only true-hearted man I ever met. You find a way back to that girl of yours and make her happy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How am I gonna get past the guards?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll worry about the guards. (loudly) OKAY, STU. SEE YOU IN A DAY OR TWO. She turns down the corridor. STU stands there for a beat, key in his hand. Then he hears the sound of CARNAGE outside. A FEROCIOUS, seems to be underway. Realizing that KITTY must be in tro the key to unlock the dungeon door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He finds KITTY hunched in the corner on all fours, surrou and tufts of fur and an abandoned GUARD'S HAT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go. Just go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, Kitty, I'll never forget you for th-- She looks up at him, feline eyes aglow. There's a three-f RODENT'S TAIL dangling out of her mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll really...never...forget you. He races off as KITTY resumes her feast. The sound of fig roused the other DUNGEON DWELLERS, and when they realize door is open they come rushing out en masse. Then the PANEL opens. They hear FOOD raining down behind is the first to turn back - then STEPHEN KING - then ATIL later they're back to their old habits, climbing over one at a half-empty box of Raisinets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The usual gang sitting around at their computer terminals coolly reading NOTEBOOK ENTRIES into a TAPE RECORDER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "4/17: Subject, when unaware of observation, prefers to hold eating utensils...with feet. Successfully carves turkey roll holding eating utensils...with feet."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They had a case like that at Johns Hopkins. Wires got crossed between hands and feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great lead. I'll try and find it on the net.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "4/18: Subject climbs backyard tree...to perform elimination. When confronted with product... blames it on family dog." DEAD SILENCE from the mortified group. They never had a c at Johns Hopkins. JULIE somehow keeps a stiff upper lip - embarrassed for STU, but a scientist nonetheless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seems perfectly obvious. He's been possessed by a monkey! The others all GLOWER at HUTCH for this egregious display

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STU-BONE and HERB are standing outside the garage in form crew of ZOO WORKERS load MONKEYBONE DOLLS into a pickup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're really gonna pop the question?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got the ring. Got the airline tickets. Soon as they break that piata, we'll grab a cab - and it's off to the land of palm trees and coconuts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't believe you. You used to hate being the center of attention. Now you're proposing, in public, at a benefit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I was thinking...I mean, I'm a celebrity now, do I really want to get married? But on the other hand, if you're married, they can't testify against you. HERB wonders if this is a joke, decides it is, and forces

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JULIE is getting dressed for the benefit when the PHONE R

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello? Oh, Hutch - what?

dialogues.speaker: JULIE AND HUTCH
dialogues.text: HUTCH is at the sleep lab, standing over the open refrige

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Nightmare Juice! It's gone! Somebody switched it for a beaker of grape Kool-Aid!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kool-Aid!? But who'd would want to - Her eyes move to the WINDOW - to STU-BONE out by the gara

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Call the police. I'll be right over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two DETECTIVES examining the scene of the crime.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The technical name is Oneirix. It's an enzyme. It's present in the brains of -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (cutting her off; writing) Yeah, yeah...Nightmare juice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And there's been no sign of a break-in?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy shit...the pants. (remembering) The janitor found a pair of torn-up pants. It was the same night the monkey tipped her cage over. Remember that, Julie?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (suddenly afraid) Yeah...I remember it vividly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIVERIED WAITERS scurrying all about in preparation for t WORKERS set up tables and chairs underneath a giant CANOP STU-BONE watches with satisfaction as the last of the DOL into a giant piata in the shape of STANLEY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The big creaky swivel chair swings around, revealing DEAT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, if I may ask - what kind of idiot sneaks into the Land of Death twice? The party he's addressing is STU - who's stretched out ho strapped to a medieval TORTURE RACK, with a whole posse o standing guard around him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're mad at me. Great. You have every right to be. But we're both mad at Dark Town. We're both mad at Hypnos.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, sure. Now you're gonna tell me it was all his idea. You were completely innocent -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not going to tell you that. I wanted that E- ticket. I wanted it so bad I'd stare you right in the face to get it - and I'd do the same again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have a girl up there. And I never - I should've - I just want to tell her I love her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a simple man. I'm just doing my job. I enjoy my job. Why does everyone want to make it difficult for me? Stealing tickets, switching bodies...it is so irresponsible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Death, I'm trying to make things right. Take my soul. Turn me into a paper doll. But give me just one lousy hour.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well - you'd need a body. DEATH gestures for the REAPERS to unshackle STU.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If it wasn't for that comic strip of yours, I wouldn't be doing this. But a good chuckle is darned hard to come by. (chortling) That one where Monkeybone stole the soap cake out of the urinal - I thought I would die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coming from you, that's quite a compliment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: De nada. Now, come here...bend over...before I change my mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bend over? DEATH rears back and KICKS HIM, full-force, SMACK IN THE supernatural might of the blow sends STU ROCKETING UPWARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TEAM OF SURGEONS. The lead SURGEON has his arm buried u in the open torso of an ORGAN DONOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay...detaching the left kidney... SCREAMS ALL AROUND as the ORGAN DONOR sits BOLT UPRIGHT! SURGEON drops the kidney back into place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the - who the hell am I??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're an organ donor!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Am I dead?!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The chute didn't open. We kind of assumed -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need this body. Just for a few minutes. I'll bring it back, okay? The ORGAN DONOR grabs a lab coat from a nearby rack and r since STU is temporarily occupying the DONOR's body, we w refer to him as O.D. STU.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O.D. STU comes racing around a corridor. His LAB COAT is with gore, and he's having trouble holding his GUTS in. H spills out onto the floor just as two DOCTORS stroll past

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (eyeing the pancreas) Might have someone take a look at that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Yeah. Thanks. The DOCTORS move on. O.D. STU spots a JANITOR'S CART with TAPE on one shelf. He WRAPS IT TIGHTLY around his midsect innards from falling out. Then he runs for it. Now the TEAM OF SURGEONS rounds the corner in hot pursuit SURGEON spots O.D. STU at the end of the corridor and tak him. But he SLIPS on the PANCREAS and goes sprawling! The pancreas goes flying down the hall, where it gets SQU succession by a GURNEY and by a little old lady's MOTORIZ When the SURGEONS retrieve it, it's a hunk of pulp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think it can still be saved. Put it on ice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GUESTS are beginning to arrive for the benefit. In the ca habitats, animals stare up at a gigantic MONKEYBONE BALLO

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: The BAZOOM TOY REP is rounding a corner when HERB pops ou tree and BLASTS HIM with a jolt of purple gas from a Monk sputters and coughs... Then he grabs the doll away and blasts HERB right back! T chase each other around the tree, giggling. The BAZOOM RE her formal gown, affects a look of supreme mortification.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O.D. STU climbs over the fence, finds a hidden key, and l

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O.D. STU rushes frantically from room to room. O.D. STU (o.s.)

dialogues.speaker: DOC
dialogues.text: No reply - the joint's empty. O.D. STU enters the studio NEWSPAPER on his drafting table. The paper is folded back DISPLAY AD for the benefit: "MEET STU MILEY AND MONKEYBON TONIGHT!" He checks the wall clock: time is short. Reaching into the drawer of the drafting table, he pulls BOX which contains old brushes...and a small VELVET BOX. the velvet box to reveal Grandma's ANTIQUE RING. He hears GROWLING behind him - it's BUSTER. The dog looks head - and begins WAGGING HIS TAIL. Somehow, even though different body, BUSTER recognizes him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O.D. STU exits, ring in hand. Behind him, BUSTER is throw barking, FLINGING himself at the screen door. He wants to A BUS pulls up at the corner, and O.D. STU boards it. BUS everything he's got at the door - and it gives! He takes

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As HERB is walking toward the refreshment table, an ODD L face. All at once he begins to TUG at his collar. He yank ...doffs his JACKET onto the pavement...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The nightmare drug is kicking in! The whole zoo SWIMS aro once he's being ATTACKED...by a HORDE of EMPTY CLOTHES!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JULIE has arrived at the zoo. She's wandering zombie-like food court, flanked by her friends ALICE and CLARISSA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever he's done, I'm responsible for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not true, Julie. It's not true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is not about your guilt, Julie. There could be innocent people in danger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not the same guy. He's not your Stu. (beat) I didn't want to tell you this, but the other day he pinched me on the butt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't want to tell you this, but the other day he tried to mount me from behind! Look, you have to tell the police.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell them what? I don't know anything concrete. All I have is a feeling. All of a sudden, they hear SHOUTS and LAUGHTER from the a reptile house. In the distance, ZOO SECURITY GUARDS are c MAN through the crowds of formally-dressed partygoers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God, we've got a flasher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That...that's Herb! The GUARDS catch hold of HERB and drag him away past JULI CLARISSA. He doesn't recognize any of them. He's PSYCHOTI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOTHES! Beware of clothes. They're working together. All of them. Shirts...pants...

dialogues.speaker: ENSEMBLES...
dialogues.text: The three women exchange looks of stupefied HORROR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PASSENGERS are holding their noses, frantically pulling o to alert the driver that they want off. As we move toward see O.D. STU sitting alone, with rows of empty seats on e He looks rough. He's bone-white, his taped-up lab coat is blood, and he never did find any shoes. Also, it's a hot starting to get a little ripe. FLIES are buzzing all arou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BUSTER runs down the sidewalk as fast as his stumpy littl carry him, in pursuit of the BUS.

dialogues.speaker: LATE AFTERNOON
dialogues.text: The team of SURGEONS has been tracking O.D. STU across th the windshield they see the BUS pulling up outside the zo hops out and sprints across the parking lot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O.D. STU doesn't even stop at the ticket window. He VAULT turnstile, knocking benefit guests aside. The SURGEONS ar behind. They race up to the ticket window -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you see a corpse running this way? The TICKET-TAKER shrugs and points off in O.D. STU's dire

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last stages of dinner. WAITERS are already clearing p although JULIE has barely touched her food she sends her Onstage a BAND is playing tasteful zoo jazz. When the num BONE approaches the dais and leans into the mike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As emcee I want to thank you all for joining us at this swingin' bash...it's a special night for the birds, and the lions, and the monkeys, but it's also a special night for - (tapping his chest) - this monkey. And it's special because of a very special lady. Her name is - (checking a note in his pocket) Julie McElroy. Just kiddin', Julie. Stand up. JULIE stands reluctantly. The CROWD APPLAUDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And to make this special night extra-special, I'd like to do a special number...especially for you. A DISCO BALL lowers. STU-BONE turns to welcome a group of SINGERS who are just joining the band on stage. The TENT begins to ROCK with a throbbing beat. And STU-BO into a wild-eyed, hip-shaking parody of Mick Jagger singi Stones' "MONKEY MAN"! As he sings, STU-BONE gyrates over toward JULIE, bumping like the cartoon-monkey sex machine he is. He waves his m crowd, urging everyone to join in. JULIE gasps in disbeli crowd is eating it up - clapping and singing along with S He gestures for pretty women to join him out on the floor shirt at the neck, exposing a hitherto unseen plenitude o He pulls out a hanky to mop his brow and tosses it to the wipes his armpits with a second hanky and tosses it to th blows his nose into a third and tosses it to the crowd. Then he JUMPS UP ON THE TABLES and shakes his booty wildl and out among the dessert plates. If the real Jagger coul would creep home a sad and broken man. For the big finale, he jumps off the table and SLIDES ACR to JULIE'S table - arriving ON HIS KNEES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am just a Monkey Man! I'm glad you are a monkey...woman...too. (soft voice) How about it, Julie? He pulls out a RING BOX and hands it to the beet-red JULI lets out a collective GASP - followed by WILD APPLAUSE. She stares down at the ring - a big vulgar sparkler. She

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll hop a plane tonight. An island ceremony. An Abba Dabba honeymoon!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks so...new.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is new. Why wouldn't it be new?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the heirloom ring. Your grandmother's ring...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heirloom? Huh? You want a used ring - ? No reply. She's taking a long time to say yes. The audien muttering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ju-leeee... Operators are standing by... Offer expires at midnight, December 31... Suddenly a GORE-STAINED FIGURE bursts into the tent.

dialogues.speaker: MONKEYBONE
dialogues.text: JULIE's jaw drops. She barely gets a glimpse of O.D. STU GUARDS arrive to haul him away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boy, the nuts are out tonight. What'd that creep call you - ?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He called me "Doc." - which STU-BONE never does. Someone in the crowd yells..

dialogues.speaker: HEY MONKEYBONE
dialogues.text: STU-BONE turns and does a simian COMEDY SHTICK for the cr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's me, folks! Monkeybone! Let's party! By the time he's done scratching his ribs, JULIE has vani

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She races out of the tent - grabs a passing ZOO GUARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please. Where did you take that man...? The GUARD points to an ANIMAL CONTROL VAN. JULIE sees O.D out through a small barred panel. Their eyes meet...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you? Why did you say those things?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Doc, it's all a mixup. We were in the land of death. He stole my e-ticket. That's how he got my body, see? All they had left for me was this corpse! JULIE digests this, nods professionally, and turns to wal

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't walk away, Doc! He's only here to give people nightmares! (no response) Doc! Please! Don't you remember the dream? They were pulling the plug - I called out to you - and you heard me. Remember? This stops JULIE cold. Her spine is tingling. She turns s tear rolling down her cheek. And then...

dialogues.speaker: BUSTER
dialogues.text: The dog runs right past JULIE and bounds up to the animal barking his head off. Now JULIE is starting to believe. S

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stu...how?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had to come back, Julie. I had to give you this. THROUGH THE BARS he hands her the little box containing G antique ring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I meant to give it to you before. The night we crashed. I was so happy, Julie, I...try to remember me like that, okay? Not like this. She slips the ring on her finger - looks up at O.D. STU w WELLING in her eyes. He makes an odd SNORKELING kind of n

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm crying too. I just don't have any tears. I'm all dried up. JULIE TURNS. The two DETECTIVES we saw in the sleep lab h arrived at the gate, and ALICE and CLARISSA are leading t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Detective, please let this man out of the van. EXT. ZOO GROUNDS - PIATA AREA - THAT MOMENT The PARTYGOERS are lined up under the gigantic Stanley-sh which is hanging from a tree. A TUBBY BANKER in a blindfo hard whack. CRACKS are beginning to appear...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, folks, it's piata time - you know the rules - five bucks a pop - and remember, it's all for the benefit of our friends the animals! (eyes brightening) Oooooh! This one's on me! The next contestant is a GORGEOUS WOMAN. He blindfolds he her from behind to help her with her grip on the bat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Choke up, baby. That's right. Choke up! Suddenly he notices the COPS marching up with JULIE, O.D. tow. He freezes, terrified - BACKS AWAY from the BABE - - and catches a BAT IN THE FACE. Several people rush up t the COPS consult with the BENEFIT ORGANIZERS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't understand, officer. This is a benefit. Surely this can wait until -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, ma'am...we need to question Mr. Miley on a most urgent matter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop this. Now. Those dolls have been tampered with. They're toxic! O.D. STU comes marching through the crowd. He passes a LI DISPLAY of Stanley and Monkeybone...GRABS THE BACKPACK of figure...and proceeds deliberately toward STU-BONE.

dialogues.speaker: MONKEYBONE...BACK IN THE PACK.
dialogues.text: The old command seems to retain its magical power, becaus clutches his gut as if stricken at the sound of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean it this time. Back in the pack. STU-BONE bends over - jerks and twitches - becoming more moment as O.D. STU approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stu...I can explain...I was sick of being a figment, see? It's awful being a figment. It's degrading! And I never really wanted to give people nightmares. I just told 'em that so they'd help me get a body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah - my body. Back in the pack, you simian shitbird! The COPS are tres confused by all this -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ma'am, can you give me some idea of what's going on here? - but JULIE holds them back so the scene can play itself BONE is doing a weird little monkey dance - PLAYING UP to crowd, who laugh and snicker, wondering what to make of a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laugh, damn you...laugh at the sidekick...the happy little monkey. He doesn't have any feelings. He's just a figment of your immagination! He turns suddenly - GRABS THE BAT from the puzzled BABE -

dialogues.speaker: GIMME THAT GODDAM BAT
dialogues.text: He wails on the piata like Ken Griffey Jr. O.D. STU tri but it's too late - the piata BURSTS, and hundreds of P MONKEYBONE DOLLS spill out onto the ground! An equal number of RABID PARTYGOERS surge forward to scoo COPS swing into action, trying to hold the crowd back...

dialogues.speaker: HE'S GETTING AWAY
dialogues.text: STU-BONE climbs a tree and JUMPS from a branch onto one o JUNGLE TOWERS at the pavilion - begins CLIMBING toward th MONKEYBONE BALLOON moored up above! O.D. STU sees him - pulls away from JULIE -

dialogues.speaker: STU
dialogues.text: STU-BONE unties the mooring rope and wraps it around his freed, the balloon LIFTS INTO THE AIR, CARRYING HIM ALOFT O.D. STU climbs up the opposite tower as the balloon star away. He GRABS HOLD of the MOORING ROPE as it whips past. And the TEAM OF SURGEONS - who have been combing the grou of O.D. STU - catch sight of him just as he FLOATS OFF IN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They rise to an altitude of ten or twelve feet. But O.D. additional weight pulls the balloon back DOWN - and both ground! They have to RUN at top speed just to keep pace w balloon!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let...go...you...dingleberry... As he's trying to KICK O.D. STU off the rope, a GUST OF W balloon and LIFTS IT HIGH INTO THE AIR. For about three seconds. The boys tumble to earth, off-ba heap, BOUNCING along the pavement. The balloon pulls them WROUGHT-IRON FENCE and drags them through the ALLIGATOR P snap as the boys glide overhead like bait on a hook. As the balloon LIFTS UP AGAIN, O.D. STU hauls himself alo of the rope. He gets close enough to GRAB STU-BONE's LEG. STU-BONE rea push him away...grabs a fistful of DUCT TAPE... ...and RIP! The tape TEARS - exposing the great big GASH midsection! He tries to pull himself together...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SERVER ladles out a cup of PUNCH from a big silver PUNC Something PINK comes plummeting out of the sky - and the knows, the SERVER is DRENCHED! The SURGEONS come rushing up. They all stick their hands punchbowl at once...fishing out O.D. STU'S KIDNEY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put it on ice. I think it can still be saved! One of the TEAM finds an ice cooler full of soft drinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOTH BOYS SCREAM as the balloon drags them perilously clo WIRE atop a tall storm fence. They clear it by inches - but they don't have much time t They're dangling over the Bengal Tiger exhibit, and the g LEAPING INTO THE AIR trying to snag them! As O.D. STU squirms out of reach, his LIVER drops out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It lands close enough to the FENCE that one of the SURGEO can reach it. He reaches through the bars and sees a pack TIGERS racing toward him! He manages to grab ONE END of t a TIGER gets the other end - - and it's a TUG-OF-WAR until the tiger BITES the liver i the terrified SURGEON sprawling on the pavement outside t HEAD SURGEON examines the remaining half-liver...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put it on ice. I think it can still be saved.

dialogues.speaker: BALLOON
dialogues.text: STU-BONE socks O.D. STU hard across the face! He lets go ...and his SMALL INTESTINE falls out! Since it's still co ends, the intestine forms a great big LOOP...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SERVER has just brought out a new PUNCHBOWL full of n punch. He sets it down on the table and is about to ladle when STU flies past overhead. His intestinal LOOP slides table, knocking over glasses, snagging the PUNCHBOWL at i ...and YANKING IT right off the table! Bystanding GUESTS punch as the punch bowl FLIES END OVER END... ...and, with the sound of a GONG being struck, BEANS a me SURGICAL TEAM from behind!! Naturally it's the guy who's CHEST full of O.D. STU's organs. When the punchbowl strik DOWN HARD, PITCHING the ice chest... ... at a pair of COPS who are over by the piata, loadin MONKEYBONE DOLLS into a SHOPPING CART. The ICE CHEST knoc their feet - and sends the SHOPPING CART rolling downhill The COPS try to get up, but they skid every which way on underneath. On top of which, the SURGICAL TEAM is all ove GRAB-ASS with the COPS as they try to retrieve precious o The HEAD SURGEON kneels beside his fallen comrade, the gu BEANED by the punchbowl, and feels for a pulse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put him on ice. I think he can still be saved!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COPS sprint downhill, trying to intercept the runaway SHO of confiscated dolls. Too late. The CART slams into a fen ass-over-teakettle, dumping its contents into the PENGUIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HYPNOS and an audience of DARKTOWNERS peer into the night see a Keystone-Cops vision of fur-clad ESKIMOS, with club spearguns, amid a colony of terrified PENGUINS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not again. THAT STINKING MONKEY!!!

dialogues.speaker: STU'S POV
dialogues.text: STU gets an idea as he looks down at his dangling INTESTI FEEDING IT OUT - giving himself more rope to work with - long enough, begins SWINGING IT like a LASSO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WATER BUFFALO graze Buddha-like as STU'S INTESTINE snags around the HORNS. The lasso draws taut - and holds!

dialogues.speaker: BALLOON
dialogues.text: The balloon is moored in place again! O.D. STU pulls hims toward STU-BONE, who KICKS AT him frantically!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A COP pulls his sidearm and TAKES AIM at the now-stabiliz

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I can bring 'em down.

dialogues.speaker: BALLOON
dialogues.text: BLAM! The cop's shot hits the giant MONKEYBONE BALLOON sm With a gale-force helium FART, the balloon ZOOMS UPWARD. snaps. STU-BONE and O.D. STU shoot off into the air! ON STU-BONE & O.D. STU - AERIAL AT APOGEE. They exchange a LOOK as the last gasp of heliu the gigantic balloon. Then it occurs to them to look DOWN

dialogues.speaker: PARKING LOT
dialogues.text: ...at the tiny CARS parked far, far below. They must be c hundred feet up in the air - and all at once the ground i fast! EXT. ZOO - ON JULIE & CROWD - LATE AFTERNOON JULIE et al SCREAM IN HORROR as the two bodies plunge ear ON STU-BONE & O.D. STU - FALLING ...and falling and falling until they SMACK INTO the hot parking lot, the deflated balloon settling over them like Their BODIES have stopped - but their SPIRITS keep on fal

dialogues.speaker: SKIES OVER DARK TOWN
dialogues.text: ...and the fight continues - even into the afterlife! As down through the heavens, they REVERT to their true perso vs. MONKEYBONE, creator vs. sidekick, still duking it out couple of skydivers fighting over a single parachute!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DARKTOWNERS pour into the streets to watch the epic strug They're placing bets, rooting their favorites on. Then... THE GROUND SHAKES AND THUNDERS - and the DARKTOWNERS scat directions, DIVING for the nearest hiding place. They see this mighty rumbing signifies. The E-TICKET RIDE pops out of the ground - begins to RISE and a COLOSSUS appears beneath it! A FIFTY-FOOT WARRIOR c CEREMONIAL ARMOR, he TOWERS over Dark Town, so mighty and he can wear the E-TICKET RIDE as a hat!!

dialogues.speaker: ON STU AND MONKEYBONE
dialogues.text: STU lands a HAYMAKER, and the two of them break loose of

dialogues.speaker: ON ARMORED COLOSSUS
dialogues.text: - LANDING in the upturned palms of the COLOSSUS! STU watc disbelief as a PANEL pops open in the giant's CHEST, reve

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I dress up when I want to make an impression. - So how'd it go?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine, thanks. Saw my girl, said goodbye, everything's gonna be okay. (shrugging) I guess I'm yours now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Death, I'd like to point out that none of this was my fault. The roots of this tragedy go back to a callous, uncaring society that - DEATH lets out a MIGHTY ROAR and CLAPS HIS GREAT METAL HA Man and monkey are surely squished. But when DEATH opens is still there, cupped safely in his palms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey. Where's Monkeybone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back in your head, where he belongs. (beat) No offense, Stu, but on your own you're kinda vanilla. I didn't want to send you back without him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back? You're sending me back?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's irregular, but...I just love that strip of yours. I figure I'll take the "Family Circus" guy instead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Death! Thank you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank me next time you see me. He sends STU ROCKETING UPWARD INTO THE STRATOSPHERE with of his finger. Then he turns...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ohhhh, Hypnos?? A BUNCH OF FRIGHTENED DARKTOWNERS pitch the quivering sat middle of the town square.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Death! So nice to see you. I can explain - He looks up tremulously. A GIANT SHADOW falls across him. GIANT ARMORED FOOT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JULIE SOBS in a POLICEMAN's arms at the exit to the zoo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know what happened. All I know is...he was in a coma...and then he came back...and now he's gone again. They wander out. Behind them, a squad of COPS are confisc MONKEYBONE DOLLS from squawling children as they file out

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TWO CORPSES, on gurneys, are being loaded into the ba police ambulance. The SURGEON and his team come wandering

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me. We lost a corpse - we saw him heading this way...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got a couple of fresh ones in the back. Help yourself. The SURGEON pulls the sheet off CORPSE #1 - aka O.D. STU.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be. It's him all right. Still dead... The SECOND CORPSE sits up abruptly. His sheet falls away, ...the real STU...now back in his own body! The SURGEON a away from the ambulance SHRIEKING.

dialogues.speaker: DUSK
dialogues.text: BUSTER barks like a maniac. JULIE turns and sees an IMPOS ambling toward her...STU, alive and kicking. She can't be until he grabs her and pulls her close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it you? Is it really you this time? He pulls her close and kisses her long and hard, quelling

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Stu. Tell me I'm not dreaming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby...you're asking the wrong guy. They wander off, arm in arm. STU TUGS at the seat of his

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the matter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My tail itches. He DOES A TAKE as he realizes what he's just said - but J and he shrugs it off. Johnny Mercer's "DREAM" comes up un reunited lovers walk off into the moonlight, and we
